verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Last Tuesday] , [ARG0: the NFL] [V: announced] [ARG1: new rules and fines for teams who allowed their players to protest during the national anthem] . Of course , the liberal media was n’t happy with the compromise of allowing players to stay in the locker room . So during NBC ’s Meet the Press on Sunday , moderator Chuck Todd and the panel were railing against President Trump and national anthem
